subject: feat: add per-filter modes and PWA install help
body:
Filters:
- Remove global AND/OR/Exclude mode (didn't make logical sense)
- Add per-filter Include/Exclude toggle for each filter type
- Convert single-select dropdowns to multi-select checkboxes
- Update URL shareable links for multi-select (comma-separated, ! prefix for exclude)
- Update localStorage persistence for new filter structure

PWA:
- Add "Install App" section to Settings panel
- Show install status (Ready/Installed/Unsupported)
- Include manual install instructions for Chrome, Safari, Firefox
- Auto-detect if already running as standalone app
